name: Blissmo, Inc.
description: Provider of an online retail platform intended to offer organic, non-toxic and eco-friendly products. The company's retail platform offers organic, non-toxic and eco products to shoppers across the web through flash sales and curated discovery boxes, enabling users to avail healthier, safer and better products
one_liner: Provider of an online retail platform intended to offer organic, non-toxic and eco-friendly products.
